days.title: Campbell Institute Award for Zero Landfill
days.description: The Campbell Institute and the Stewardship Action Council recognizes Subaru of Indiana for their outstanding achievement in sustainability by awarding them the Innovation Challenge Winner in Zero Waste.
days.shortdesc: Subaru of Indiana wins prestigious Innovation Challenge Award from the Campbell Institute.

days.title: Participant Media Looks Inside SIA's Zero-Waste Factory
days.description: Online environmental firebrand, Takepart, visits Subaru of Indiana's groundbreaking zero-waste factory. Owned by Participant Media, the company behind the acclaimed documentaries Food Inc., Al Gore's An Inconvenient Truth, and devastating doc The Cove, Takepart examines how a carmaker without a hybrid or EV manages to be one of the most environmentally responsible auto producers in the world.
days.shortdesc: The folks behind Food, Inc., An Inconventient Truth, and The Cove take a peek inside Subaru of Indiana's groundbreaking manufacturing plant.
